stories.title: Researchers develop a method to keep bots from using toxic language

stories.text:
I have a single rural rental property that I want to market to SWEs or similar remote-only knowledge workers, particularly those looking to relocate from an urban location and get (far) away from it all. For context, I manage the property from next door for my out-of-state parents; it's a truly idyllic place to live and work.

I expect that I am not alone in either having such a property to rent or desiring to find such a place to live, so I suspect that niche services exist for these demographics. I have looked around, but the options are overwhelmingly diverse.

As I respect and value the HN community's perspective and opinion, where would you be looking for such a property?
stories.title: Ask HN: Rural Rentals for Remote Workers

stories.text:
My team wanted a simple free poker planning tool.

I used that as an excuse to demo the newly released realtime apis on https://javascriptdb.com

Use it live at https://planningpoker.day

I'll be adding github projects integration soon :)
stories.title: Show HN: I built a simple realtime poker planning tool
